function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Focus on medical issues may divert attention from other aspects of pandemic management","Impact":"Failure to address non-medical aspects may lead to incomplete responses to the pandemic","Mitigation":"Ensure that resources and research efforts are allocated to non-medical aspects such as city planning and response strategies","Technologies":"Data analytics and simulation models for urban planning, social distancing technologies","People":"Public health officials, urban planners, policy makers","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies"},{"Description":"Vulnerabilities of cities to pandemics may not be fully understood","Impact":"Cities may be unprepared for future pandemics, leading to widespread vulnerabilities","Mitigation":"Conduct comprehensive assessments of city vulnerabilities and develop response plans","Technologies":"Geospatial analysis, remote sensing, public health surveillance systems","People":"Urban planners, emergency response teams, public health authorities","Owner":"Research organizations, city governments"},{"Description":"Lack of existing literature review on the impacts of the pandemic on cities","Impact":"Missed opportunity to consolidate knowledge and identify key insights for urban planning","Mitigation":"Conduct a thorough literature review to highlight existing knowledge and identify gaps","Technologies":"Text mining and natural language processing for literature review, data visualization tools","People":"Researchers, policymakers, urban planners","Owner":"Research institutions, academic institutions"}]}
